WorkItem.ClosedComment: this issue has been fixed in source and will be corrected in the next release
WorkItem.Description: When loading my hunter from the armoury (Finbarr on Ravenholdt-EU), crit percentage shows up as over 750%. This appears to be caused by the survival talent 'master tactician', which is adding about 143% crit per point. Removing all points from the talent works around this for now.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Master Tactician Talent Generating Incorrect Crit %
